content.raw:
A little hacky because I need to check Discovery's private data from the test. I did it by creating a class that inherits from `Discovery` and making the check inside. 2b34e39

The original pull request was going to send heartbeats if the discovery had information from a different process. The intent was to only send a heartbeat if you have a topic/service advertised from your local process. Thanks to the test, this has been fixed :)
